title: "Using brain implants and machine learning to 'decode' intended speech of people who can't speak"
excerpt: "UC Davis Health is recruiting people for a clinical trial with the goal of building a \"neurological prosthesis\" for restoring speech to people who have lost—or are losing—the ability to speak. The research is aimed at people who have neurological injuries or progressive neurological diseases,"
